column4: hiya, everyone.  linux n00b in the house....got a question for the resident gurus.  ALL HAIL!
weelllll...i've come across an issue with wine that seems to stem from an ubuntu bug with 64 bit processors.
Basically, I'm getting an internal error--invalid parameters error.  Everything I've found on the forums says that it's an issue with ptrace.
what is the issue?  and have you tried #winehq?  it ls a lot less crowded
